name: CLOCKWORK PUSSY
description:
A young mechanic girl ( and nymphomaniac former hooker ) inherits from her sexual client a huge vehicle repair shed. However, this workshop is in the middle of a neighborhood dominated by a gang of criminal freaks. Anaïs is a specialist in vehicle mechanics Cars, motorcycles, airplanes, tanks. Anything that has metal wheels or wings. She was raised by her mother. However, she discovers that she has a sexual client who, after dying, leaves a huge machine workshop for her. The workshop is in addition to being complete. In addition, the sexual client also left several vehicles that are worth a fortune.
However, she will have to face a dangerous gang of traffickers who dominate that region.
What will be your main weapon? SEX, seduction, strategy, and violence. Anaïs doesn't hide that she is addicted to sex. Her passion for sex is only comparable to her obsession with the smell of fuel and grease. Her late sexual client hid something very important there. The dangerous gang I mentioned knows this and will do anything to find what appears to be a precious treasure ... something much more coveted. What is hidden in the workshop?
This game is in constant development, fixing bugs in the search for the satisfaction of those who buy this EARLY ACCESS.
The old Sex Customer.
Anais was a very famous whore, precisely because she had good sex as few whores did. She went from being a talented sex worker to traveling the world. However, her last client was a very mysterious rich man. An obsessive vehicle collector and passionate about mechanics. Before he died, he decided to donate his motorized patrimony to the young bitch, mainly after discovering that she learned to repair cars, motorcycles, and boats with her brother.
- Easy to use Third Person System user interface
- Rich storyline which progresses when each puzzle is solved
- Gorgeous graphics
- Easy to use controls
- Explicit Sex and Erotic situations
This is a Third-Person game. Explore the scenery with the help of your mouse. The player runs a vehicle repair shop of all types. The aim is to explore the workshop newfound to find something very valuable that his deceased late sexual client hid on site. And she will have to do that before a dangerous local gang gets a hold on this supposed fortune.
The experience of the game goes far beyond exploring the workshop in search of a valuable object or seducing criminals with sex, libido, and body fluids. During this unusual search, Anais discovers things about her that could change her destiny completely. It is very likely that she inherited much more from her sexual client than she imagines.
Something, perhaps much more dangerous!
